    Class Description
    AcceptInvitationBDDEspressoTest
    Given that I login successfully, and click "Team", When click I click "Pending Invites", Then I will see all my invitations, When I click on one of them, and accept, Then I will see my new list of teammates in Team Screen.
    AcceptInvitationUnitTest  
    CheckTeamScreenBDDEspressoTest
    Scenario: User has a team, sees team members listed in app Given that the user has a team, When they click on the "Team" button from the home screen Then a list of their fellow teammates will be displayed.
    GoogleFitAdapterUnitTest

    Handles Daily Steps and distance, latest steps, distance, and time, recording a walk.
    HomeActivityUnitTest  
    InvitationsActivityUnitTest  
    InviteTeamMemberActivityUnitTest  
    InviteTeamMemberBDDEspressoTest
    Given that I have logged into my WWR account with a valid email address And I want to invite a team member with a valid email address and the WWR app When I click the “Team” button on the Home screen, And click the “+” button on the team screen, When I am prompted to enter the name and gmail address of the person I want to join my team, And I click invite, Then the sent invitation will be sent successfully.
